Original: Oh, will you accept this quest? It may
indeed be perfectly suited to you.
[Page]
A group of soldiers are exploring [Color:5]the
east side of the Windy Plains[Color:0]. But
they lack the food to carry on.
[Page]
So your task would be to gather [Color:5]food[Color:0]
and [Color:5]drop it off[Color:0] for them.
[Page]
Their camp is in the forest. I was
given to understand that it is in
an open area.
[Page]
Freshness is important in food, so you
must find and deliver it in [Color:5]one trip[Color:0].
I shall await your swift return.
Translation: Oh, will you accept this quest? It may
indeed be perfectly suited to you.
[Page]
A group of soldiers are exploring [Color:5]the
east side of the Windy Plains[Color:0]. But
they lack the food to carry on.
[Page]
So your task would be to gather [Color:5]food[Color:0]
and [Color:5]drop it off[Color:0] for them.
[Page]
Their camp is in the forest. I was
given to understand that it is in
an open area.
[Page]
Freshness is important in food, so you
must find and deliver it in [Color:5]one trip[Color:0].
I shall await your swift return.

Original: Welcome back. You had no trouble
delivering the food, I take it?
[Page]
Then here is the promised reward.
Perhaps I should have you find some
food to serve at my establishment...
Translation: Welcome back. You had no trouble
delivering the food, I take it?
[Page]
Then here is the promised reward.
Perhaps I should have you find some
food to serve at my establishment...

Original: Welcome back. The soldiers returned
from their expedition recently and
added a small bonus to the reward.
[Page]
It seems that the food you delivered
to them was especially delicious.
[Page]
If it was that good, I would like to
try it sometime. Perhaps I should
post a request of my own...
Translation: Welcome back. The soldiers returned
from their expedition recently and
added a small bonus to the reward.
[Page]
It seems that the food you delivered
to them was especially delicious.
[Page]
If it was that good, I would like to
try it sometime. Perhaps I should
post a request of my own...

Original: Welcome back. The soldiers just
visited here and added quite the
hefty bonus to your reward.
[Page]
It seems that the food you delivered
to them was especially delicious.
They were eminently satisfied.
[Page]
If it was that good, I would like to
try it sometime. Perhaps I should
post a request of my own...
Translation: Welcome back. The soldiers just
visited here and added quite the
hefty bonus to your reward.
[Page]
It seems that the food you delivered
to them was especially delicious.
They were eminently satisfied.
[Page]
If it was that good, I would like to
try it sometime. Perhaps I should
post a request of my own...

Original: Welcome back. You had no trouble
delivering the food, I take it?
[Page]
Then here is the promised reward.
Perhaps I should have you find some
food to serve at my establishment...
Translation: Welcome back. You had no trouble
delivering the food, I take it?
[Page]
Then here is the promised reward.
Perhaps I should have you find some
food to serve at my establishment...

Original: By the way... you should know that the
food you delivered made the soldiers
take ill and cut short their journey.
[Page]
I wonder what happened...? If you are
explorers too, you will have to manage
your health better than they did.
Translation: By the way... you should know that the
food you delivered made the soldiers
take ill and cut short their journey.
[Page]
I wonder what happened...? If you are
explorers too, you will have to manage
your health better than they did.

Original: You notice a group of soldiers waving
to you from the forest below.
[Page]
You recall the request from the bar
to deliver food to some soldiers...
These are most likely the ones.
Translation: You notice a group of soldiers waving
to you from the forest below.
[Page]
You recall the request from the bar
to deliver food to some soldiers...
These are most likely the ones.

Original: However, you have no food on you.
If you mean to fulfill this request,
you must get food on your skyship.
Translation: However, you have no food on you.
If you mean to fulfill this request,
you must get food on your skyship.

Original: If you mean to fulfill the request,
it is best that you drop the food
off at the soldiers' location.
Translation: If you mean to fulfill the request,
it is best that you drop the food
off at the soldiers' location.

Original: You pack the [Color:6][Number:1][Color:0] in a
wooden crate and lower it to the
soldiers. They eagerly open the box.
[Page]
After checking over the contents,
they signal you, satisfied. They
seem pleased with the food.
[Page]
The request is now complete! You can
turn it in the next time you find
yourself at the bar.
Translation: You pack the [Color:6][Number:1][Color:0] in a
wooden crate and lower it to the
soldiers. They eagerly open the box.
[Page]
After checking over the contents,
they signal you, satisfied. They
seem pleased with the food.
[Page]
The request is now complete! You can
turn it in the next time you find
yourself at the bar.

Original: You pack the [Color:6][Number:1][Color:0] in a
wooden crate and lower it to the
soldiers. They eagerly open the box.
[Page]
After checking the contents, they
signal you with a cheer so loud
you can hear it from your skyship.
[Page]
It seems that the food you delivered
was very well received.
[Page]
The request is now complete! You can
turn it in the next time you find
yourself at the bar.
Translation: You pack the [Color:6][Number:1][Color:0] in a
wooden crate and lower it to the
soldiers. They eagerly open the box.
[Page]
After checking the contents, they
signal you with a cheer so loud
you can hear it from your skyship.
[Page]
It seems that the food you delivered
was very well received.
[Page]
The request is now complete! You can
turn it in the next time you find
yourself at the bar.

Original: You pack the [Color:6][Number:1][Color:0] in a
wooden crate and lower it to the
soldiers. They eagerly open the box.
[Page]
After checking the contents, they
begin to dance and cheer so loud you
can hear it from your skyship.
[Page]
It seems that the food you delivered
could not possibly have been any
better received.
[Page]
The request is now complete! You can
turn it in the next time you find
yourself at the bar.
Translation: You pack the [Color:6][Number:1][Color:0] in a
wooden crate and lower it to the
soldiers. They eagerly open the box.
[Page]
After checking the contents, they
begin to dance and cheer so loud you
can hear it from your skyship.
[Page]
It seems that the food you delivered
could not possibly have been any
better received.
[Page]
The request is now complete! You can
turn it in the next time you find
yourself at the bar.

Original: You pack the [Color:6][Number:1][Color:0] in a
wooden crate and lower it to the
soldiers. They eagerly open the box.
[Page]
After checking over the contents,
they hang their heads in obvious
disappointment...
[Page]
However, the request specified that
you deliver food, and that you have
done. The request is now complete!
[Page]
You can turn it in the next time you
find yourself at the bar.
Translation: You pack the [Color:6][Number:1][Color:0] in a
wooden crate and lower it to the
soldiers. They eagerly open the box.
[Page]
After checking over the contents,
they hang their heads in obvious
disappointment...
[Page]
However, the request specified that
you deliver food, and that you have
done. The request is now complete!
[Page]
You can turn it in the next time you
find yourself at the bar.

Original: You can see smoke from the soldiers'
campfire as they cook the food...
Translation: You can see smoke from the soldiers'
campfire as they cook the food...

Original: As you steer your skyship past, you
see something fly by you!
[Page]
It is a smattering of arrows!
[Page]
You look below you to see the soldiers
drawing their bows and aiming the
next volley at your skyship.
[Page]
They seem to be angry about something.
You quickly veer off before the irate
soldiers hit you.
Translation: As you steer your skyship past, you
see something fly by you!
[Page]
It is a smattering of arrows!
[Page]
You look below you to see the soldiers
drawing their bows and aiming the
next volley at your skyship.
[Page]
They seem to be angry about something.
You quickly veer off before the irate
soldiers hit you.

Original: You manage to load the requested food
onto the skyship. All that is left is
to deliver it during this trip.
Translation: You manage to load the requested food
onto the skyship. All that is left is
to deliver it during this trip.
